name: OCF - OFELIA Control Framework
body:
### OFELIA Control Framework
OFELIA Control Framework (OCF) is a set of software tools for testbed management. It controls experimentation life-cycle; reservation, instantiation, configuration, monitoring and uninistantiation.

### [Wiki](https://github.com/fp7-ofelia/ocf/wiki)
You can find the OCF wiki under github [wiki pages](https://github.com/fp7-ofelia/ocf/wiki) of the OCF project.

#### Authorship
OFELIA Control Framework is being in actively developed and used as a production CF by [OFELIA FP7 project](http://www.fp7-ofelia.eu/) testbed. OCF is actively developed by WP5 group inside [OFELIA FP7 project](http://www.fp7-ofelia.eu/), and is under an important refactoring process.

#### License
OCF is released under BSD license
